Name: Worthy Sacrifice
Description: This card provides 3 [resource:blood] blood when sacrificed.

Name: Hearty Offering
Description: When sacrificed, this card provides as much [resource:blood] blood as its current health.

Name: Life Donor
Description: When sacrificed, this card loses 1 health for each [resource:blood] blood it provides instead of perishing.

Name: Many Lives
Description: This card does not perish when sacrificed.

Name: Nine Lives
Description: This card does not perish when sacrificed. After sacrificing it 9 times, search a "TOKEN" and place it over this.

Name: Lifeblood
Description: All other cards you control can be sacrificed, no matter what they say.

Name: Blood Battery
Description: Every 4 [resource:energy] energy you spend in a single turn, gain a blood token. These can serve as substitute for 1 [resource:blood] blood when playing a card.

Name: Unburial
Description: When played, gain 1 [resource:bone] bone.

Name: Bone Digger
Description: This card provides 1 [resource:bone] bone during your end step.

Name: Tomb Digger
Description: This card provides 2 [resource:bone] bones during your end step.

Name: Mass Grave
Description: This card provides 3 [resource:bone] bones during your end step.

Name: Scrounger
Description: When this card kills another, gain 1 [resource:bone] bone.

Name: Skull Taker
Description: When this card kills another, gain 3 [resource:bone] bones.

Name: Scavenger
Description: Each time an opposing card perishes, gain 1 [resource:bone] bone.

Name: Bone Leech
Description: Each time you gain a [resource:bone] bone due to [sigil:Scavenger] "Scavenger", gain another.

Name: Fracture
Description: When this card perishes by combat gain [resource:bone] bones equal to the damage it was dealt, including damage overflow.

Name: Bone King
Description: This card provides 4 [resource:bone] bones when it perishes, instead of 1.

Name: Memoriam
Description: When another card you control perishes, gain an additional [resource:bone] bone.

Name: Loose Bones
Description: During your end step, move this card to an adjacent empty lane, generating 1 [resource:bone] bone.

Name: Spine Walker
Description: During your end step, move this card to an adjacent empty lane, generating 2 [resource:bone] bones.

Name: Bonehorn
Description: During your play step, you may pay 1 [resource:energy] energy to gain 1 [resource:bone] bone.

Name: Battery Bearer
Description: When played, gain 1 max energy [resource:max_energy] and refill 1 [resource:energy] energy.

Name: Dynamo
Description: During your draw step, gain 1 additional [resource:energy] energy and [resource:max_energy] max energy.

Name: Generator
Description: During your end step, gain 1 [resource:max_energy] max energy.

Name: Death Surge
Description: When this card perishes, gain 1 max energy [resource:max_energy] and refill 1 [resource:energy] energy.

Name: Overclocked
Description: When this card kills another, gain 1 max energy [resource:max_energy] and refill 1 [resource:energy] energy.

Name: Fossil Fuel
Description: During your play step, you may pay 3 [resource:bone] bones to get 1 max energy [resource:max_energy] and refill 1 [resource:energy] energy.

Name: No Max Reduction
Description: While this card is on the field, your [resource:max_energy] maximum energy cannot decrease.

Name: Green Gem
Description: This card provides one [resource:green_gem] Green gem.

Name: Orange Gem
Description: This card provides one [resource:orange_gem] Orange gem.

Name: Blue Gem
Description: This card provides one [resource:blue_gem] Blue gem.

Name: Prism Gem
Description: This card provides one [resource:prism_gem] gem of any color.

Name: Magnificent Gem
Description: This card provides 3 [resource:prism_gem] gems of any colors.

Name: Overcoat
Description: All Mox cards you control provide a [resource:prism_gem] gem of any color.

Name: Fragment Hoard
Description: This card may be shattered to provide 2 shattered [resource:prism_gem] gems of any color.

Name: Body of Dust
Description: When playing a card, each gem you shatter counts as 2 shattered gems.

Name: Bloodless
Description: This card cannot be sacrificed.

Name: Boneless
Description: This card does not drop a [resource:bone] bone when it perishes.

Name: Gem Dependent
Description: If you control no other Mox cards, this card perishes.

Name: Circuit Dependent
Description: If this card is not between two Conduit cards, it perishes.

Name: Familiar
Description: If you control no other sacrificeable cards that do not have this sigil, this card perishes.

Name: Annoying
Description: The opposing card has 1 more power.

Name: Brittle
Description: If this card attacked this turn, it perishes during your end step.

Name: Salvation
Description: On its owner's second end step after this card was played, it is moved to the discard pile without perishing.

Name: Desecration
Description: When played, search any card from your deck and discard it.

Name: Rotting
Description: During your end step, this card loses 1 health and power.

Name: Primed Explosive
Description: This card loses 1 health during your end step. Perishing from this counts as perishing by combat.

Name: Ravenous
Description: During your end step, this card loses 1 health unless you sacrifice a card to it.

Name: Dust Eater
Description: During your end step, this card loses 1 health unless you shatter a Mox card for it.

Name: Defiler
Description: When this card perishes, discard the top card of your main deck.

Name: Death Sentence
Description: When this card perishes, its owner takes 12 direct damage.

Name: Airborne
Description: This card attacks directly instead of the opposing card.

Name: Heavy Wings
Description: If this card has 3 power or less, it attacks the opposing space directly.

Name: Falconry
Description: While on the field, Avian cards you control may choose to strike the opposing card or to strike directly when attacking.

Name: Aquanaut
Description: This card's strikes may ignore the [sigil:Waterborne] "Waterborne" sigil.

Name: Touch of Death
Description: When this card damages another, that card perishes.

Name: Bifurcated Strike
Description: This card only strikes both adjacent spaces to the opposing space. Additional power only apply to the first strike.

Name: Split Strike
Description: When attacking, this card only strikes the lane left or right of the opposing space.

Name: Trifurcated Strike
Description: When attacking, this card strikes the opposing space and the spaces adjacent to it. Additional power only apply to the first strike.

Name: Double Strike
Description: This card strikes twice when it attacks. Additional power only apply to the first strike.

Name: Sniper
Description: This card may target any enemy space each time it strikes.

Name: Pack Tactics
Description: When another card sharing a tribe with this one is struck, this card strikes the card that struck it.

Name: Piercing
Description: When this card strikes another, half of the damage taken, rounded down, is also dealt directly.

Name: Sharp Piercer
Description: When this card strikes another, half of the damage taken, rounded down, is also dealt directly. If this card has 1 power, it is rounded up instead.

Name: Aggressive
Description: When played, the opposing card is dealt 1 damage.

Name: Sentry
Description: Once per turn cycle, after a card enters the opposing space, this card deals it 1 damage.

Name: Poisonous
Description: During your opponent's end step, the opposing card loses 1 health.

Name: Sharp Quills
Description: When a card damages this card, it is dealt 1 damage in return.

Name: Gem Instability
Description: When a card damages a Mox card, it is dealt 1 damage in return.

Name: Deathtrap
Description: When this card perishes by combat if there is an card opposing it, it perishes and your opponent draws 1 card from their side deck.

Name: Croaking Trap
Description: When an Amphibian card you control perishes by combat, the card that killed it is dealt 3 damage.

Name: Detonator
Description: When this card perishes, it deals 5 damage to any adjacent cards. If it perished by combat, it also deals 5 damage to the opposing card.

Name: Gem Detonator
Description: When a Mox card you control perishes, it deals 5 damage to any adjacent cards. If it perished by combat, it also deals 5 damage to the opposing card.

Name: Snake Eyes
Description: When this card perishes, roll a d6. A corresponding amount of damage is dealt to adjacent cards, and, if this card perished by combat, to the opposing card.

Name: Marrow Blast
Description: When this card perishes, it deals 5 damage to any adjacent cards. If it perished by combat, this also applies to the opposing card. You gain 1 [resource:bone] bone for each card killed this way.

Name: Energy Gun
Description: During your play step, you may pay 2 [resource:energy] energy to deal 1 damage to the opposing card.

Name: Dive Bomb
Description: During your play step, you may sacrifice this card to deal damage equal to its current health to any card on the field.

Name: Yeetbot
Description: During your play step, discard a "TOKEN" from your hand to deal 3 damage to any card on the field.

Name: Fireball
Description: During your play step, shatter a Mox card you control to deal damage equal to 3 times its current power to any card on the field.

Name: Mighty Leap
Description: If this card's space would be struck directly, this card takes the damage instead.

Name: Waterborne
Description: Strikes targeting this card deal damage directly instead.

Name: Armored
Description: This card has an [mark:armor] Armor mark. When a card bearing it would take damage, the mark is removed instead.

Name: Dust Barrier
Description: When a Mox card you control perishes outside of combat, place an [mark:armor] Armor mark on this card. When it would take damage, the mark is removed instead.

Name: Bastion
Description: When this card would take damage it only takes half as much, rounded up.

Name: Repulsive
Description: This card cannot be attacked.

Name: Gem Guardian
Description: When played, place an [mark:armor] Armor mark on all Mox cards you control that don't have one. When they would take damage, their mark is removed instead.

Name: Made of Stone
Description: This card's power cannot be reduced, and it ignores the [sigil:TouchofDeath] "Touch of Death" sigil.

Name: Burrower
Description: When an empty space on your side would be struck, this card moves to it first.

Name: Gem Intercept
Description: When a Mox card you control would be struck, you may first swap its position with this card's.

Name: Taunt
Description: Strikes targeting adjacent cards hit this one instead.

Name: Iron Wall
Description: When another Chess card you control is struck, this card receives the damage instead.

Name: Loose Tail
Description: The first time this card would be struck shift it to an adjacent empty space, then search and place a "TOKEN" in its old space.

Name: Evasion
Description: When this card would be struck, you may move it to an adjacent empty space first.

Name: Unkillable
Description: This card returns to your hand when it perishes.

Name: Sprinter
Description: During your end step, move this card to an adjacent empty space.

Name: Clinger
Description: Each time you place a card, move this card to the closest open space between them.

Name: Hefty
Description: During your end step move this card to an adjacent space, pushing other cards in its way if needed.

Name: Bulldoze
Description: During your play step, you may pay 2 [resource:energy] energy to move this card to an adjacent space, pushing other cards in its way if needed.

Name: Rampager
Description: During your end step move this card to an adjacent space, swapping places with the card in that place.

Name: Warper
Description: During your end step, move this card to any empty space on your side.

Name: Snag
Description: When played, move 1 card on the field to an empty space on its own side.

Name: Restructure
Description: When played, you may move all cards you control to any spaces on your field.

Name: Guardian
Description: When your opponent places a card opposite of an empty space, move this card to that space.

Name: Rooted
Description: This card cannot be moved from the space it was placed in until it perishes.

Name: Fledgling
Description: On your next draw step, search a "TOKEN" and play it over this.

Name: Creeping Outwards
Description: On the second draw step after this card was played, search a "TOKEN" and play it over this.

Name: Wild Reshape
Description: On your next draw step, place your deck's top card in this card's space.

Name: Undeath
Description: On your next draw step, search any common TOKEN card from your discard and place it in this card's space.

Name: Tentacleful
Description: On your next draw step, search and place any Tentacle card over this one.

Name: Frozen Away
Description: When this card perishes, search and place a "TOKEN" in its space.

Name: Ruby Heart
Description: When this card perishes by combat, search and place a "Ruby Mox" in its place.

Name: Ensouled
Description: When this card perishes by combat, search a common Spectre card from your discard and play it in this space for no cost.

Name: Corpse Eater
Description: When a card you control perishes in combat, you may place this card in its space.

Name: Gem Repair
Description: When a Mox card you control perishes by combat, draw a card from your side deck and place it in its place.

Name: Legion
Description: When played, search a common card from your discard that shares a tribe with this card, and place it for free in any empty space on your side.

Name: Dam Builder
Description: When played, search up to 2 "Dam"s and place them in adjacent empty spaces.

Name: Regurgitate
Description: When played, draw and play a card from your side deck in each adjacent space.

Name: Swarm
Description: When played, search up to 2 copies of this card from your discard and place them in adjacent empty spaces.

Name: Soul Raiser
Description: When played, search up to 2 common Spectre cards from your deck and play them in adjacent spaces, paying their costs.

Name: Skeletal Horde
Description: When played, play a "Skeleton" from your side deck in each sempty space on your side.

Name: Remote Bomb
Description: When played, search and place any common card with [sigil:Detonator] "Detonator" into each empty space on either side of the field. They will be sent to your discard when perishing.

Name: Squirrel Shedder
Description: During your end step, move this card to an adjacent empty space and play a "Squirrel" from your side deck in its previous space.

Name: Skeleton Crew
Description: During your end step, move this card to an adjacent empty space, search a common Skeleton Pirate card, or a "Skeleton", and place it in its previous space.

Name: Spirit Spread
Description: During your end step, move this card to an adjacent empty space and place any Spectre card from your discard in its previous space.

Name: Leep Legion
Description: During your end step, move this card to an adjacent empty space and play a "L33pbot" from your side deck in its previous space.

Name: Mox Dropper
Description: During your end step, move this card to an adjacent empty space. Search any Mox card from your side deck and place it in its previous space.

Name: Frog Friend
Description: During your end step, move this card to an adjacent empty space and search and place any Amphibian card in its previous space.

Name: Transmogutate
Description: Once per turn during your play step, sacrifice a card you control to search any Side Deck Mox card and place it in its place.

Name: Gift Bearer
Description: When this card perishes by combat, draw a card.

Name: Generosity Bearer
Description: When this card perishes by combat, draw two cards.

Name: Gem Greed
Description: When a Mox card you control perishes by combat, draw a card.

Name: Go Fetch
Description: While this card is on the field, draw a card everytime a Canine card you control perishes by combat.

Name: Infinite Knowledge
Description: When any Cultist card you control perishes, draw a card.

Name: Loaded
Description: When this card perishes, draw a total of 3 cards from your main and/or side deck.

Name: Mental Gemnastics
Description: When played, look at as many cards from your deck as Mox cards you control, and add one to your hand. Shuffle the rest back into your deck.

Name: Unearthed Pack
Description: When played, shuffle your discard pile and then show its top 5 cards to your opponent. Add 2 cards they select to your hand and discard the rest.

Name: Handy
Description: When played, discard your hand, and draw an equivalent number of cards, plus 2.

Name: Looter
Description: When this card deals direct damage, draw a card for each point of damage it dealt.

Name: Side Hustle
Description: When this card deals direct damage, draw a card from your side deck for each point of damage dealt.

Name: To a Flame
Description: Each time this card moves to a different space, draw a card.

Name: Firey Rummage
Description: During your play step, discard a card from your hand to draw a card from your deck. This card then loses 1 health.

Name: True Scholar
Description: Once per turn during your play step, shatter a Mox card you control to draw 2 cards.

Name: Altar Prayer
Description: When played, look at and rearrange the top 3 cards on your deck, adding any Altar cards you see to your hand.

Name: Bees Within
Description: When this card takes damage, search a "TOKEN" into your hand.

Name: Rabbit Hole
Description: When played, search 1 "Rabbit" into your hand.

Name: Ant Spawner
Description: When played, search a common Ant card into your hand.

Name: Fecundity
Description: When played, search another copy of this card from your deck.

Name: Imitation Art
Description: When played, search a copy of any card on your field.

Name: Spirit Medium
Description: When played, search any common Spectre card from your discard to your hand.

Name: Chew Toy
Description: When played, search any Hound card from your deck.

Name: Mech Builder
Description: When played, search any common Mechabeast card into your hand.

Name: Horde
Description: When this card kills another, search a common card sharing at least one of this card's tribes to your hand.

Name: Fragile Construct
Description: When played, search any common card with [sigil:Brittle] "Brittle" into your hand.

Name: Re-Index
Description: When played, search 1 common card from your deck and discard each costing up to 6 [resource:energy] energy.

Name: Hoarder
Description: When played, search any common card from your main deck.

Name: Upbringing
Description: When played, search any non-Side Deck free card from your main deck.

Name: Search Engine
Description: When played, search any card that costs [resource:energy] energy from your deck to your hand.

Name: Rabbit Soul
Description: When sacrificed, search 1 "TOKEN" into your hand.

Name: Dust Gatherer
Description: Once per turn, when a Mox card you control perishes outside of combat, search a Side Deck Mox card from your side deck or discard.

Name: Hotfix
Description: When a Tech card you control with 0 base power perishes by combat, draw a card from your side deck.

Name: Disentomb
Description: During your play step, you may pay 2 [resource:bone] bones to search one "Skeleton" from your side deck.

Name: Equivalent Exchange
Description: Once per turn during your play step, you may exchange a card from your hand with one from your discard pile. Both cards must share a tribe.

Name: Colony
Description: This card's power is equal to the number of other Ant cards you control.

Name: Facsimile
Description: This card's power is equal to the opposing card's power.

Name: Strong Hand
Description: This card's power is equal to the number of cards in your hand, to a maximum of 5.

Name: Spilt Blood
Description: This card's power is equal to the number of sacrifices you made this turn, to a maximum of 5.

Name: Scattered Bones
Description: This card's power is equal to half the number of unspent [resource:bone] bones you own, rounded down and to a maximum of 5.

Name: Gem Powered
Description: This card's power is equal to the number of Mox cards you control.

Name: Gem-locked
Description: This card's power is equal to 3 minus the number of Mox cards you control.

Name: Power Dice
Description: When played, roll a d6. This card's power is equal to the result.

Name: traeH Power
Description: This card's power is equal to the opposing card's health.

Name: Stalker
Description: The end step after this card is played, it gains 1 power.

Name: Overcharge
Description: For every [resource:max_energy] max energy you would have gained when already at 12, this card gains 1 power, up to 7.

Name: Raging Flames
Description: During your end step, this card loses 1 health and gains 1 power.

Name: Bell Ringer
Description: Each time the bell is rung this card gains 1 power, to a maximum of 5.

Name: Bloodlust
Description: Each time this card kills another, it gains 1 power.

Name: Lord of Beast
Description: Each time you sacrifice this card it gains 1 power, to a maximum of 5.

Name: Dust Power
Description: Each time a Mox card you control perishes outside of combat, this card gains 1 power, up to 5.

Name: Cold Read
Description: When played, write down the full name of any Common card. Each time it is played by anyone, this card gains 1 power, up to 5.

Name: Dooming Dust
Description: Once per turn during your play step, shatter a Mox card you control to make 1 of your cards perish during your end step, but have 2 more power on its next strike.

Name: Stimulate
Description: During your play step, as many times per turn as you have Mox cards on your field, you may pay 3 energy to make this card gain 1 power, up to 5.

Name: Infinifold
Description: Once per turn, shatter a Mox card to double this card's power, up to 9999999999999999999999999999999999.

Name: Leader
Description: Adjacent cards have 1 more power.

Name: Sea Shanty
Description: All cards you control with the [sigil:Brittle] "Brittle" sigil have 1 more power.

Name: Haunted Stonework
Description: All other cards you control with [sigil:MadeofStone] "Made of Stone" have 1 more power, and all cards in your hand with [sigil:MadeofStone] "Made of Stone" cost 3 fewer [resource:bone] bones to play.

Name: Truest Patron
Description: All cards you control with [sigil:Familiar] "Familiar" have 1 more power.

Name: Witching Hour
Description: All Spectre cards you control have 1 more power.

Name: Leep Leader
Description: All other Leep cards you control have 1 more power.

Name: Gem Animator
Description: All Mox cards you control have 1 more power.

Name: Unholy Will
Description: All Cultist cards you control have 1 more power.

Name: Offense Upgrade
Description: All Tech cards you control with exactly 1 base power have 1 more power.

Name: Overpower
Description: All other cards you control have 2 more power.

Name: Soul Strike
Description: When this card perishes by combat, select a Mox card you control. It gains 1 power and immediately strikes the opposing space.

Name: Sparkling Dust
Description: Once per turn during your play step, shatter a Mox card you control to give 1 card you control 1 more power.

Name: Arcane Blessing
Description: Once per turn during your play step, discard a card from your hand to give 1 of your cards 1 more power.

Name: Convalesce
Description: During your end step this card gains 1 health, to a maximum of 5.

Name: Eternal Life
Description: During your end step, all Cultist cards you control gain 1 health, up to 5.

Name: Prosperity
Description: During your end step, all other cards you control gain 1 health, up to 5.

Name: Bloodsucker
Description: After this card damages another it gains 1 health, up to 5.

Name: Soul Stealer
Description: When this kills a card, gain [resource:max_energy] 1 max energy, refill 1 [resource:energy] energy, and increase this card's health by 1, up to 5.

Name: Heart of Dust
Description: Each time a Mox card you control perishes outside of combat, this card gains 1 health, up to 5.

Name: Gem Reinforce
Description: When this card perishes, all Mox cards you control gain 1 health.

Name: Enlarge
Description: During your play step, pay [resource:bone] bones equal to this card's current power plus 1 to increase its power and health by 1.

Name: Swapper
Description: When this card takes damage, swap its current health and power values.

Name: Morsel
Description: When sacrificed, it's health is added to the card it was sacrificed to.

Name: Plague
Description: While this card is on the field, when a Vermin card you control damages another, that card perishes.

Name: Recall the Broken
Description: When any card you control perishes due to [sigil:Brittle] "Brittle", return it to your hand.

Name: Rattle 'em!
Description: Cards you control with [sigil:Brittle] "Brittle" may target any enemy space each time they strike.

Name: Haunter
Description: When this card perishes, leave it sideways on the field. Treat its space as empty until another card enters it. That card inherits all its other sigils.

Name: Haunting Reflection
Description: When this card perishes, the next card to be placed in its space will have power equal to the card currently opposing it.

Name: Stinky
Description: The opposing card has 1 less power.

Name: Putrid Essence
Description: The opposing card's power is reduced by the number of Mox cards you control.

Name: Glooming Dust
Description: Once per turn during your play step, shatter a Mox card you control to reduce the power of any card on the field by 1 until it perishes.

Name: Purist
Description: The opposing card is treated as having no sigils.

Name: Null Conduit
Description: This card counts as a "Conduit" card.

Name: Attack Conduit
Description: Cards between this and another Conduit card have 1 more power.

Name: Overclock Conduit
Description: Cards between this and another Conduit card have 2 additional power, but perish during your end step.

Name: Heal Conduit
Description: Cards between this and another Conduit card gain 1 health during your end step, up to 5.

Name: Armor Conduit
Description: During your end step, place an [mark:armor] Armor mark on any cards that don't have one between this and another Conduit card. When they would take damage, their mark is removed instead.

Name: Spawn Conduit
Description: During your end step, search and place any common or side deck card costing up to 3 [resource:energy] energy in any empty space between this and another Conduit card.

Name: Blood Conduit
Description: If you control another Conduit card, this one will not perish when sacrificed.

Name: Energy Conduit
Description: While you control another Conduit card, your energy will always be at its current max.

Name: Green Conduit
Description: If you control another Conduit card, this one provides one [resource:green_gem] Green gem.

Name: Orange Conduit
Description: If you control another Conduit card, this one provides one [resource:orange_gem] Orange gem.

Name: Blue Conduit
Description: If you control another Conduit card, this one provides one [resource:blue_gem] Blue gem.

Name: Prism Conduit
Description: If you control another Conduit card, this one provides one [resource:prism_gem] gem of any color.

Name: Buff when Powered
Description: If this card is between two Conduit cards, it has 2 more power.

Name: Tri-strike when Powered
Description: If this card is between two Conduit cards when attacking, it strikes the opposing space and the spaces adjacent to it. Additional power only apply to the first strike.

Name: Generous when Powered
Description: If this card is between two Conduit cards, draw 2 cards when it perishes.

Name: Digger when Powered
Description: If this card is between two Conduit cards, gain 2 [resource:bone] bones during your end step.

Name: Power when Powered
Description: If this card is between two Conduit cards, gain 1 max energy [resource:max_energy] during your end step.

Name: Breaker when Powered
Description: If this card is between two Conduit cards, Conduit cards cannot be attacked.

Name: Toxic Latch
Description: When this card perishes by combat, choose any card on the field. Any card that it damages will perish.

Name: Explosive Latch
Description: When this card perishes by combat, choose any card on the field. When it perishes, it deals 5 damage to adjacent cards, and if it perished by combat, the same applies to the opposing card.

Name: Shield Latch
Description: When this card perishes by combat, choose any card on the field. It gains an [mark:armor] Armor mark. When it would take damage, the mark is removed instead.

Name: Immortal Latch
Description: When this card perishes by combat, choose any card on the field. When it perishes, it goes back to your hand.

Name: Shovel Latch
Description: When this card perishes by combat, choose any card on the field. During its owner's end step, it generates 1 [resource:bone] bone.

Name: Prism Latch
Description: When this card perishes by combat, choose any card on the field. It now provides one [resource:prism_gem] gem of any color.

Name: Circuit Latch
Description: When this card perishes by combat, choose any card on the field. This card now counts as a "Conduit" card.

Name: Enhanced Transformer
Description: During your end step toggle this card's [mark:transform] Transform mark. While marked, this card has 1 more power.

Name: Empowered Transformer
Description: During your end step toggle this card's [mark:transform] Transform mark. While marked, this card has 2 more power.

Name: Enraged Transformer
Description: During your end step toggle this card's [mark:transform] Transform mark. While marked, this card has 4 more power.

Name: Flying Transformer
Description: During your end step toggle this card's [mark:transform] Transform mark. While marked, this card deals direct damage when attacking.

Name: Takeoff Transformer
Description: During your end step toggle this card's [mark:transform] Transform mark. While marked, this card deals direct damage when attacking and has 1 more power.

Name: Lethal Transformer
Description: During your end step toggle this card's [mark:transform] Transform mark. While marked, any card that it damages will perish.

Name: Sniper Transformer
Description: During your end step toggle this card's [mark:transform] Transform mark. While marked, it may target any enemy space each time it strikes.

Name: Spiky Transformer
Description: During your end step toggle this card's [mark:transform] Transform mark. While marked, when a card damages this card, it is dealt 1 damage in return.

Name: Repulsing Transformer
Description: During your end step toggle this card's [mark:transform] Transform mark. While marked, this card cannot be attacked.

Name: Immortal Transformer
Description: During your end step toggle this card's [mark:transform] Transform mark. If this card perishes while marked, it goes back to your hand.

Name: Power Hemanation
Description: When sacrificed toggle this card's [mark:transform] Transform mark. While marked, this card has 2 more power.

Name: Flying Hemanation
Description: When sacrificed toggle this card's [mark:transform] Transform mark. While marked, this card deals direct damage  when attacking.

Name: Starving Hemanation
Description: When sacrificed toggle this card's [mark:transform] Transform mark. While marked, this card has 2 more power and deals direct damage when attacking.

Name: Animated Hemanation
Description: When sacrificed toggle this card's [mark:transform] Transform mark. While marked, all Mox cards you control have 1 more power.

Name: Bloody Hemanation
Description: When sacrificed toggle this card's [mark:transform] Transform mark. While marked, it provides 3 [resource:blood] blood when sacrificed.

Name: B34st Tamer
Description: During your play step, you may toggle the Transform mark on any card you control for free.

Name: Enhanced Arcane
Description: If you provide 2 unique colors of gems, this card has 1 more power.

Name: Lethal Arcane
Description: If you provide 2 unique colors of gems when this card damages another, that card perishes.

Name: Aiming Arcane
Description: If you provide 2 unique colors of gems, this card may target any enemy space each time it strikes.

Name: Leading Arcane
Description: If you provide 2 unique colors of gems, adjacent cards have 1 more power.

Name: Animated Arcane
Description: If you provide 2 unique colors of gems, all Mox cards you control have 1 more power.

Name: Evolving Arcane
Description: If you provide 2 unique colors of gems on your next draw step, search a "TOKEN" and play it over this.

Name: Unstable Arcane
Description: If you provide 2 unique colors of gems, any card that damages a Mox card is dealt 1 damage in return.

Name: Repulsing Arcane
Description: If you provide 2 unique colors of gems, this card cannot be attacked.

Name: Shadow Arcane
Description: If you provide 2 unique colors of gems, other cards you control will behave as though you have 3 more cards in your hand.

Name: Assembly
Description: This card may only be played by sacrificing an Automaton, Sniper Bot and Shield Bot, in any order.

Name: Sacrifices Must Be Made
Description: This card's cost must be paid by sacrificing at least 3 cards.

Name: True Prism
Description: This card's cost must be paid entirely with gems of unique colors.

Name: Spine Ripper
Description: For each card in your discard with [sigil:Brittle] "Brittle", you may play this card for 1 less [resource:bone] bone.

Name: Abyss Cost
Description: For each "TOKEN" in your discard, you may play this card for 2 less [resource:bone] bones.

Name: Scalebound
Description: You may move the scales 2 points closer to you in order to play this card for free.

Name: Crew Member
Description: If you control a card with the [sigil:SkeletonCrew] "Skeleton Crew" sigil, you may play this card for free.

Name: Night of the Living Dead
Description: You may play Undead cards for 2 fewer [resource:bone] bones.

Name: Dog Treat
Description: While this card is on the field, Hound cards may be played for half their cost, rounded down.

Name: Unseelie Authority
Description: When playing a card, you may move the scales 1 point closer to you to decrease it's cost by 2 [resource:bone] bones. 3 if that card is a Spectre card.

Name: Puppet Master
Description: Cards you control with [sigil:Brittle] "Brittle" will not perish from it, but will immediately perish when this card dies.

Name: Mental Fortitude
Description: While there are at least 2 cards in your hand, cards you control will ignore the [sigil:GemDependent] "Gem Dependent" sigil.

Name: Trinket Bearer
Description: When payed you may either draw a card from your side deck, gain 4 [resource:bone] bones, or gain 2 max energy [resource:max_energy] and refill 2 [resource:energy] energy.

Name: All-Sight
Description: During your draw step, you may look at the top card of one of your decks before drawing.

Name: Divination
Description: When played, look at and rearrange the top 3 cards on your deck.

Name: Prophecy
Description: While this card is on the field, any time you would draw an unspecified card from your deck, search any card from your deck instead.

Name: Humgry
Description: When played the opponent must discard a card of their choice from their hand, if they have one.

Name: Polymorph
Description: When played, the opponent must discard the card opposing this one and place their deck's top card in its place.

Name: Event Horizon
Description: When played, return another card you control and 1 card your opponent controls to their respective owners' hands.

Name: Amorphous
Description: This card is treated as having all of the opposing card's sigils.

Name: Reaction Replica
Description: When playing a card, take it off the field and play it a second time for free. This only applies once per card.

Name: Double Death
Description: When another card you control perishes all effects pertaining to its death, including gained bones,[resource:bone] happen a second time.

Name: Arcane Echo
Description: Whenever you use an activated ability, trigger its effect a second time.

Name: Illusion Dust
Description: During your end step, all other cards you control will behave as though you just shattered a Mox card.

Name: Dusted Knuckles
Description: When this card kills another, activate the effects of any activated ability on any card you control, even if it was already triggered this turn.

Name: Pay Tribute
Description: During your play step, sacrifice a card you control to increase this card's power by 1 and gain [resource:bone] bones equal to the sacrificed card's max health. It will perish regardless of its sigils.

Name: Nameless
Description: This card counts as every possible tribe.
